item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Well, for one thing, the culture we have does not make people feel good about themselves. We're teaching the wrong things. And you have to be strong enough to say if the culture doesn't work, don't buy it. Create your own. Most people can't do it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "Among other things, you'll find that you're not the first person who was ever confused and frightened and even sickened by human behavior. You're by no means alone on that score, you'll be excited and stimulated to know. Many, many men have been just as troubled morally and spiritually as you are right now. Happily, some of them kept records of their troubles. You'll learn from them—if you want to. Just as someday, if you have something to offer, someone will learn something from you. It's a beautiful reciprocal arrangement. And it isn't education. It's history. It's poetry." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "God only rarely reveals the future. When he does so, it is for one reason: it's a future that was written so as to be altered." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is only one sin. and that is theft... when you tell a lie, you steal someones right to the truth." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is a way to be good again..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I became what I am today at the age of twelve, on a frigid overcast day in the winter of 1975. I remember the precise moment, crouching behind a crumbling mud wall, peeking into the alley near the frozen creek. That was a long time ago, but it’s wrong what they say about the past, I’ve learned, about how you can bury it. Because the past claws its way out. Looking back now, I realize I have been peeking into that deserted alley for the last twenty-six years." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Quiet is peace. Tranquility. Quiet is turning down the volume knob on life. Silence is pushing the off button. Shutting it down. All of it. - Amir" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "War doesn't negate decency. It demands it, even more than in times of peace." - Baba" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I wondered if that was how forgiveness budded; not with the fanfare of epiphany, but with pain gathering its things, packing up, and slipping away unannounced in the middle of the night." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There was brotherhood between people who had fed from the same breast, a kinship that even time could not break. - Amir" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Children aren't coloring books. You don't get to fill them with your favorite colors." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It was only a smile, nothing more. It didn't make everything all right. It didn't make ANYTHING all right. Only a smile. A tiny thing. A leaf in the woods, shaking in the wake of a startled bird's flight. But I'll take it. With open arms. Because when spring comes, it melts the snow one flake at a time, and maybe I just witnessed the first flake melting. - Amir" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "She said, 'I'm so afraid.' And I said, 'why?,' and she said, 'Because I'm so profoundly happy, Dr. Rasul. Happiness like this is frightening.' I asked her why and she said, 'They only let you be this happy if they're preparing to take something from you." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is always a gap between intention and action.." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paolo Coelho
item.description: "In adolescence she thought it was too early to choose, now in youth she was convinced it was too late to change." -- Paolo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People never learn anything by being told, they have to find out for themselves." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Stay mad, but behave like normal people. Run the risk of being different, but learn to do so without attracting attention." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Brigitte add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who has lost something they thought was theirs forever finally comes to realise that nothing really belongs to them." -- Paulo Coelho
